choices.name: Defend
choices.tip: Protect yourself and all players standing near you.  You will all take less damage.

choices.name: Build
choices.tip: Build or repair the building you're at.  This can upgrade buildings.

choices.name: Harvest
choices.tip: Extract resources from the building you're at.  What is extracted depends on the building type.  Buildings have limits on how many players can harvest from them per turn.

choices.name: Activate
choices.tip: Use the special ability of the building you're at.  Depending on the building, this might require that it is built and charged.

choices.name: Charge Up
choices.tip: Increases the charge of the ability you're at, so it can be activated.

choices.name: Assist
choices.tip: Aid other nearby players who are harvesting, building, or activating near you.

choices.name: Hide
choices.tip: Hide in a cowardly fashion.  This will protect you from damage but doesn't help anyone else.

choices.name: Give
choices.tip: Trade one of your items to a friend.
